text: Mariyu variki adam yokka iddaru kumarula (habil mariyu khabil la) yathartha kathanu vinipincu. Variddaru (allah ku) bali (khurbani) icci nappudu okani (habil) bali svikarinca badindi mariyu rendava vani (khabil) bali svikarinca badaledu. (Khabil) annadu: "Niscayanga nenu ninnu camputanu." (Daniki habil) annadu: "Niscayanga, allah bhayabhaktulu galavari (baline) svikaristadu
